data.text: We are flying to three different destinations in Lapland; Rovaniemi, Kittilä and Ivalo. The best chance to see northern lights is in Ivalo as it is the most north location. Northern lights are visible approximately 200 days a year in northern Lapland. https://t.co/w6QmxOFy9d

data.text: Near Kuusamo, you can hike to your heart's content in the starkly beautiful Finnish nature in one of the magnificent national parks, such as Oulanka National Park. In September, we are flying from Helsinki to Kuusamo nine times a week: https://t.co/aIsGEf51Bu https://t.co/13qDV1vADn
@MandyManjinder Hi, flights are gradually added month by month. //Mari

@dlzvlz Hi,

Could you please send private message (DM) with your booking reference or ticket number as well as the email and phone number on the booking.

So we can check your booking details and fare rules.

-Erkki

Are you dreaming of seeing northern lights? September is a particularly good time to see the northern lights because there’s a higher chance of more clear, cloudless nights than in the depths of winter. Read more: https://t.co/G5hFLhBGV9

RT @AnaLauraMedran5: @Finnair Thank you finnair, I really felt saved on my flight! We need more airlines doing what you do!👏🏼 
✅Distance be…
@AnaLauraMedran5 Great to hear you had a good experience with us - welcome on board again! 🙂 Heidi / Finnair
@MandyManjinder Hi, according to the current information our flights from Delhi will start on October 3. //Mari

@zzzcq2 Hi,

Currently these flights will be operated normally.

If you have any other questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us.

-Erkki

We will fly fewer frequencies to European destinations in September than previously planned. Lapland and Kuusamo seem to be of more interest to domestic passengers than expected, and we are adding new flights to these destinations. https://t.co/U5a7q00YHB
@jcrsala Hi, Apologies for the delay with your refund. We will handle this as soon as possible. //Mari

data.text: How do you choose the right mask for you? What can you do to stop them steaming up your glasses or ruining your makeup? We collected some tips on how to make wearing a mask as comfortable as possible. https://t.co/Z6UGhsrY6Q

@onlyblingbling1 Hei,

Voisin tarkastaa lentovarauksesi ja takaisinmaksun tilanteen, ilmoittaisitko yksityisviestinä varaustunnuksesi tai lipun numeron? 
Saisinko tunnistetietona myös sähköpostiosoitteen ja puhelinnumeron, mitkä on ilmoitettu varaukselle?

-Erkki

@rowenanews Hi, we actually stopped sending tier downgrade letters in March when we announced tier extension for all tier members. If you DM us, we can have a look at your account and see your extension status. Regards, Heidi / Finnair
@imflormarianne Hi! I have answered to your DM. -Hanna

data.text: @The_Nicolatte Sorry about the matter. Can you please send us now a direct message or use our Chat at https://t.co/906IMFcH8u /Heidi
@harrimatias Kiitos palautteestasi. Se on meille tärkeää ja pyrimme ottamaan sen huomioon kehittäessä palveluamme entistä paremmaksi. /Heidi
@Finlaco I hope that you will get an answer the soonest. Have a great weekend! /Krista from Finnair

@Finlaco Unfortunately, I don’t work in customer service. All the messages will go into a system where customer service will handle all the questions chronologically. Please note that our customer service has a lot of questions in their queue so it might take more than 24 hours to answer.
RT @jonivirkkunen: #Finnair cabin then and now... (DC3 vs A350) https://t.co/g0tZA0kI99 https://t.co/ciqzGmjYyR

@Finlaco Hi, I see that you have received an answer to your private message yesterday. I'm sorry to say that there is some delay in our responses but our customer service will get back to you as soon as they can. /Krista from Finnair Communications

data.text: In July, we carried 145,300 passengers, which is 90.0% less than in the corresponding period of 2019 but 163.0% more than in June 2020. The COVID-19 impact was still clearly visible in the July traffic figures, cargo demand was fairly strong. Read more: https://t.co/DMHln8VPHY https://t.co/71OKDJor5d

Superhappy to notice @FinnairSuomi service is st…
@1431Resistance Hello! I am sorry to hear about your situation. Please DM us your booking details, and we will investigate this further. -Jenny

@MarianDaily8 Hi! We are still operating on this route but with less operations. In August we have flights only Mondays, Fridays and Saturdays. Please find the timetable here: https://t.co/vYBO1vkJBi. ///Anu

@DavidCarolan1 Hi,

I apologize for the inconvenience

Could you please send private message (DM) with your booking reference or ticket number as well as the email and phone number on the booking?

These flights will be confirmed later.

https://t.co/IhwM1NFn2X

Keeping our customers and crew safe is Finnair’s top priority. As we start to ramp up our network, we’ve introduced a series of measures to ensure everyone feels comfortable and stays safe. https://t.co/kQeDFyir9y
@IamMissSindy Hi, if you bag has broken during our flight, please send info about it to email lostbaggage@finnair.com //Roosa

https://t.co/IKD9rP5K8Q

-Erkki
@ArnoKourula Hi Arno, thank you that's very nice to hear. Have a great week! //Roosa

@i_j_oliver Hei, kuvan perusteella sinun matkaan on tullut aikataulumuutos. Jos lähetät meille yksityisviestillä sinun varaus- ja yhteystiedot, niin voimme tarkistaa asian. Sinun pitäisi myös pystyä näkemään uusi aika/lento varaukseni-palvelun kautta. //Mari
@Majidale Hi, thank you for your suggestion and have a nice day! 😊 //Mari
@Plex22427260 Hi, I have sent you a DM. //Mari

@HelenaGron Hi Helena, please send your booking reference, email address and phone number via DM that we can take a look.//Roosa

data.text:
@BMLoidl Hallo! Leider gehört Österreich immer noch zu den Schengen-Ländern mit Beschränkungen für die Einreise nach Finnland. Die Selbstquarantäne wird für diejenigen empfohlen, die aus Ländern, die der Binnengrenzkontrolle unterliegen, nach Finnland reisen.
https://t.co/irZquSLPjK

Here's why airplanes are an unlikely place to catch viruses:
👉 HEPA filters remove 99.97% of bacteria and viruses
👉 The air in cabins is completely changed every 3-7 mins
👉 There is no air flow forward or rearward along the cabin
Read more: https://t.co/a82jfdRB2k

@adrianfiechter Hi! Thank you for you feedback. Unfortunately, it is not possible to use gift vouchers on mobile and the only option would be to use vouchers on our old webpage: https://t.co/3NEDlinayn. It is possible to use the voucher online when the departure is from euro country. //Anu

@henkkaxx Hej! Enligt information vi har för tillfället, opererar vi till AYT och GZP i august. Ändå det är bra att kolla via gränsbevakningsväsendet vilka resedocumenter man behöver, och om man måste betänka andra saker i Turkiet. Det finns mer information här: https://t.co/LcguemFMvU
@j1n3l0 Hi! Could you please DM us your booking reference, passenger names and route so I'll take a look? Please see the policies for changes and refunds here: https://t.co/JQTMaTC2zl //Anu

data.text:
In Q2, the COVID-19 pandemic almost halted our passenger traffic, and our result was heavily in the red. Over 70% of our revenue came from cargo. Now the rebuild phase has started, and we expect to fly ~50% of our normal amount of flights in September. 

https://t.co/A3PTcvTjt8 https://t.co/u2dTudQ0b5

data.text: RT @paivyttallqvist: Sourcing is a key part of our sustainability work. Local products are helping us to keep high hygiene standards on boa…

@roivod Hi, sorry to hear that. I would recommend that you try to update the app or delete this and download it again before trying to book one more time. Also, please check if you have been charged first and send us a DM if you need any further assistance. //Mari
